name: A Stone's Throw
description:
A casual jam game about skipping stones.

All work done in a weekend, by Dylan Gedig & Sienna Blumstengel.

Skybox from BOXOPHOBIC: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/free-skybox-cubemap-extended-107400

If you don't have a VR-headset and want to check out the game, you can view a short play-through here (Warning: it does contain "spoilers"):
